    Class for handling board view
    Author:
    stefanominotti, eknidmucollari

      • BoardView

        public BoardView(int skulls,
                 java.util.List<SquareView> squares,
                 int arena)
        Class constructor, it builds a board view
        Parameters:
        skulls - number set for the board
        squares - square view which compose the arena
        arena - arena number

      • BoardView

        public BoardView(int skulls,
                 java.util.List<SquareView> squares,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<GameCharacter>> killshotTrack,
                 boolean frenzy,
                 boolean beforeFirstPlayer,
                 int arena,
                 java.util.List<GameCharacter> deadPlayers)
        Class constructor, it builds a board view when a game is already started and you want to resume it
        Parameters:
        skulls - number set for the board
        squares - square view which compose the arena
        killshotTrack - killshot tracks of the game characters
        frenzy - true if Final Frenzy is active, else false
        beforeFirstPlayer - true if the current player is playing before the first player, else false
        arena - arena number
        deadPlayers - List of dead players
